synopsis.text: He's the last man standing in a world of women: meet Itsuki, an ordinary high school student with an extraordinary secret. A global pandemic has left all men impotent, except for him. To protect his unique condition, Itsuki transfers to a special high school, where he's surrounded by an abundance of female students. As the only viable male left, Itsuki becomes the center of attention for a variety of interesting characters, including a cheerful senior, a sexually frustrated teacher, a tomboyish school 'prince,' and a wealthy heiress. In this world filled with four billion potential partners, Itsuki must navigate the challenges of being the last functional man on Earth while deciding who will ultimately win his heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
